p.k: Art Lebanon (2010). Hrají: Badih Bouchakra, Takla Chamoun, Nadine Labaki. Režie: Georges Hachem.
p.d: Noha is about to get married. Her family is relieved to see her take advantage of this last chance before o cially becoming a spinster just l ike her sister. Everything seems to be going well. However, on this special Sunday of August 1976 in Lebanon, on the same evening her elder brother is organizing a dinner in her honor 15 days prior to the wedding, Noha changes her mind.
